item.author: Author
item.description: title: “Inventions” date: 2021-06-05T19:20:03+10:00 draft: false INVENTIONSBENJAMIN FANKLINBenjamin Franklin was born on January 17th 1706 in Boston, Massachusetts. He first became known to the public as the publisher of the newspaper, The Pennsylvania Gazette. Did you know that Benjamin Franklin was one of the five members that drafted the declaration of independence? Perhaps he is most famous for work with electricity. His experiments helped prove that lightning is a form of electricity.
